channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为亚洲经济体软着陆前景改善
item.description: Asian central banks may see scope to loosen monetary policy later this year as inflation moderates, heightening prospects for a soft landing in the region's economies, the International Monetary Fund said on Wednesday.翻译:国际货币基金组织周三表示，随着通胀放缓，亚洲央行可能会在今年晚些时候看到放松货币政策的空间，从而增强该地区经济软着陆的前景。
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 1月份中国工厂活动再次萎缩，需求依然疲软
item.description: China's manufacturing activity contracted for the fourth straight month in January, an official factory survey showed on Wednesday, suggesting the sprawling sector was struggling to regain momentum at the start of 2024.翻译:周三的官方工厂调查显示，中国制造业活动 1 月份连续第四个月萎缩，这表明这个庞大的行业在 2024 年初难以恢复增长势头。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大雾导致中国港口暂停航运；上海发布加强咨询
item.description: Heavy fog has suspended the operation of ships travelling through the Qiongzhou Strait off the coast of China's Guangdong province and several cities, including Shanghai, have issued warning advisories, Chinese state media reported on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，大雾导致穿越中国广东省沿海琼州海峡的船只暂停航行，包括上海在内的多个城市已发布警告公告。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新西兰外长：美国需要在太平洋地区加强合作
item.description: New Zealand will start talks on Wednesday with Australia about cooperating with the AUKUS trilateral defence partnership between, Foreign Minister Winston Peters said, adding Washington needed to do more in the Pacific to counter other political influences there.翻译:新西兰外交部长温斯顿·彼得斯表示，新西兰将于周三开始与澳大利亚就与 AUKUS 三边防务伙伴关系的合作进行谈判，并补充说华盛顿需要在太平洋地区采取更多行动，以对抗那里的其他政治影响。
item.author: Lucy Craymer

item.title: 市场关注美联储，美元有望月度上涨
item.description: The dollar headed for its biggest monthly gain since September and the yen for its sharpest drop in nearly a year on Wednesday, as traders waited on a U.S. rates decision to round out January.翻译:周三，美元创九月以来最大月度涨幅，日元创近一年来最大跌幅，交易员等待美国一月份利率决定。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 台湾对中国“单方面”改变台湾海峡航线感到愤怒
item.description: Taiwan's government expressed anger after China "unilaterally" changed a flight path close to the sensitive median line in the Taiwan Strait, saying it appeared to be a deliberate attempt to change the status quo for possible military means.翻译:台湾政府对中国“单方面”改变靠近台湾海峡敏感中线的飞行路线表示愤怒，称这似乎是故意试图改变现状，以可能采取军事手段。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管存在分歧，欧盟贸易主管仍将继续推进美国电池矿物谈判
item.description: The U.S. and European Union failed on Tuesday to reach a trade deal for critical battery minerals but are vowing to press ahead with talks to create a transtlantic marketplace for minerals and other components, the EU's top trade official said on Tuesday.翻译:欧盟最高贸易官员周二表示，美国和欧盟周二未能就关键电池矿物达成贸易协议，但誓言将继续推进谈判，以建立一个跨大西洋的矿物和其他零部件市场。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 中央情报局局长：基辅今年面临艰苦战斗，美国援助流动至关重要
item.description: Ukraine will likely face a tough year fighting Russia in 2024, CIA Director Bill Burns said on Tuesday, arguing that to cut off U.S. aid to Kyiv would be an error of "historic proportions."翻译:中央情报局局长比尔伯恩斯周二表示，2024年乌克兰可能会面临与俄罗斯作战的艰难一年，他认为切断美国对基辅的援助将是一个“历史性的”错误。
item.author: Arshad Mohammed, Jonathan Landay

item.title: 早盘：中国采购经理人指数、美联储声明将测试增长前景
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 星巴克因中东冲突下调销售预期，警告第二季度疲软
item.description: Starbucks cut its annual sales forecast on Tuesday as the Israel-Hamas war hurt its Middle East business, while warning that softer demand in January and slow recovery in China were likely to dent its second-quarter performance.翻译:由于以色列与哈马斯战争损害了其中东业务，星巴克周二下调了年度销售预期，同时警告称，一月份需求疲软和中国复苏缓慢可能会削弱其第二季度业绩。
item.author: Deborah Sophia

item.title: 雪佛龙将哈萨克斯坦石油改道至非洲周边的亚洲 - 消息来源，伦敦证券交易所集团数据
item.description: Chevron is sending cargoes of Kazakhstan's CPC Blend oil to Asia around Africa's Cape of Good Hope rather than via the Red Sea to avoid the risk of attacks by Yemen’s Houthis, according to three industry sources and LSEG ship-tracking data.翻译:据三位行业消息人士和伦敦证券交易所集团船舶跟踪数据显示，雪佛龙正在将哈萨克斯坦的 CPC Blend 石油货物沿着非洲好望角而不是通过红海运往亚洲，以避免也门胡塞武装发动袭击的风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着电动汽车需求放缓，行业痛苦加剧
item.description: While automakers are betting big on future demand for EVs, a near-term global slowdown is causing pain.翻译:尽管汽车制造商对电动汽车的未来需求下了很大的赌注，但近期的全球经济放缓正在带来痛苦。
item.author: Nick Carey, Joseph White

item.title: 博尔顿在新回忆录介绍中称特朗普“不适合”担任总统
item.description: Former U.S. National Security Adviser John Bolton excoriated former President Donald Trump as an utterly self-interested man who would punish personal enemies and appease adversaries Russia and China in a new edition of his memoir released on Tuesday.翻译:美国前国家安全顾问约翰·博尔顿在周二发布的新版回忆录中痛斥前总统唐纳德·特朗普是一个完全自私的人，他会惩罚私人敌人并安抚对手俄罗斯和中国。
item.author: Arshad Mohammed, Steve Holland

item.title: IMF称全球“软着陆”在望，上调2024年增长前景
item.description: The International Monetary Fund upgraded the outlook for both the United States and China.翻译:国际货币基金组织上调了美国和中国的前景展望。
item.author: Rachel Savage, Andrea Shalal

item.title: 国际货币基金组织上调亚洲增长预测，警告中国风险
item.description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) on Tuesday projected emerging Asian economies would expand 5.2% this year, slowing from 2023 but revised up from its forecast three months ago on stronger-than-expected growth in China.翻译:国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 周二预计亚洲新兴经济体今年将增长 5.2%，较 2023 年有所放缓，但因中国经济增长强于预期而上调了三个月前的预测。
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 中美芬太尼合作北京期待“正能量”
item.description: The U.S. and China launched a joint counter-narcotics working group on Tuesday in the first overt sign of cooperation in tackling the spread of fentanyl since late 2019, before bilateral relations between the superpowers soured.翻译:周二，美国和中国成立了联合禁毒工作组，这是自 2019 年底以来两个超级大国双边关系恶化之前首次公开合作应对芬太尼泛滥。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 所谓的中国支持的黑客组织 Volt Typhoon 是什么？
item.description: Networks controlled by a pervasive Chinese hacking group dubbed "Volt Typhoon" have been disrupted by a U.S. government operation, Reuters exclusively reported on Monday.翻译:据路透社周一独家报道，美国政府的一项行动已经扰乱了一个名为“Volt Typhoon”的中国黑客组织控制的网络。
item.author: Raphael Satter, James Pearson
